entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.0°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
